indexInfo.LongName: Zebra high-performance, general-purpose structured text indexing and retrieval engine
indexInfo.Description: Zebra is a high-performance, general-purpose structured text indexing and retrieval engine. It reads structured records in a variety of input formats (eg. email, XML, MARC) and allows access to them through exact boolean search expressions and relevance-ranked free-text queries.
